Works like a charm!
The instructions might be a bit simplified for some.
The first line in the keygen (Heritage by default) is the user ID you have to use WITH that specific code. If you change it, the code will change accordingly. You can replace "Heritage" with anything you want in the keygen, then copy the user ID you entered AND code to the setup. :)
Also you can just put Heritage as the user ID and copy the code.
I just wanted to come back and update you all on my situation.  I've been using this key for over two months now and I'm not having any trouble at all.  It's all good here ^_^

Here is a simple solution for the upside down problem. Reinstall coreavc but this time when you run the keygen be sure to add an email address not just a name. It can be a fake email for instance if you used John as you username use John@john.org ect...
